4291 : collector_(collector),
4292 evacuators_(evacuators),
4293 evacuation_items_(std::move(evacuation_items)),
4294 remaining_evacuation_items_(evacuation_items_.size()),
4295 generator_(evacuation_items_.size()),
4296 tracer_(isolate->heap()->tracer()),
4297 trace_id_(reinterpret_cast<uint64_t>(this) ^
4298 tracer_->CurrentEpoch(GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE)) {}
4299
4300 void Run(JobDelegate* delegate) override {
4301 // In case multi-cage pointer compression mode is enabled ensure that
4302 // current thread's cage base values are properly initialized.
4303 PtrComprCageAccessScope ptr_compr_cage_access_scope(
4304 collector_->heap()->isolate());
4305
4306 Evacuator* evacuator = (*evacuators_)[delegate->GetTaskId()].get();
4307 if (delegate->IsJoiningThread()) {
4308 TRACE_GC_WITH_FLOW(tracer_, GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_COPY_PARALLEL,
4309 trace_id_, TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN);
4310 ProcessItems(delegate, evacuator);
4311 } else {
4312 TRACE_GC_EPOCH_WITH_FLOW(
4313 tracer_, GCTracer::Scope::MC_BACKGROUND_EVACUATE_COPY,
4314 ThreadKind::kBackground, trace_id_, TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN);
4315 ProcessItems(delegate, evacuator);
4316 }
4317 }
4318
4319 void ProcessItems(JobDelegate* delegate, Evacuator* evacuator) {
4320 while (remaining_evacuation_items_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) > 0) {
4321 base::Optional<size_t> index = generator_.GetNext();
4322 if (!index) return;
4323 for (size_t i = *index; i < evacuation_items_.size(); ++i) {
4324 auto& work_item = evacuation_items_[i];
4325 if (!work_item.first.TryAcquire()) break;
4326 evacuator->EvacuatePage(work_item.second);
4327 if (remaining_evacuation_items_.fetch_sub(
4328 1, std::memory_order_relaxed) <= 1) {
4329 return;
4330 }
4331 }
4332 }
4333 }
4334
4335 size_t GetMaxConcurrency(size_t worker_count) const override {
4336 const size_t kItemsPerWorker = std::max(1, MB / PageMetadata::kPageSize);
4337 // Ceiling division to ensure enough workers for all
4338 // |remaining_evacuation_items_|
4339 size_t wanted_num_workers =
4340 (remaining_evacuation_items_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) +
4341 kItemsPerWorker - 1) /
4342 kItemsPerWorker;
4343 wanted_num_workers =
4344 std::min<size_t>(wanted_num_workers, evacuators_->size());
4345 if (!collector_->UseBackgroundThreadsInCycle()) {
4346 return std::min<size_t>(wanted_num_workers, 1);
4347 }
4348 return wanted_num_workers;
4349 }
4350
4351 uint64_t trace_id() const { return trace_id_; }
4352
4353 private:
4354 MarkCompactCollector* collector_;
4355 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<Evacuator>>* evacuators_;
4356 std::vector<std::pair<ParallelWorkItem, MutablePageMetadata*>>
4357 evacuation_items_;
4358 std::atomic<size_t> remaining_evacuation_items_{0};
4359 IndexGenerator generator_;
4360
4361 GCTracer* tracer_;
4362 const uint64_t trace_id_;
4363};
4364
4365namespace {
4366size_t CreateAndExecuteEvacuationTasks(
4367 Heap* heap, MarkCompactCollector* collector,
4368 std::vector<std::pair<ParallelWorkItem, MutablePageMetadata*>>
4369 evacuation_items) {
4370 base::Optional<ProfilingMigrationObserver> profiling_observer;
4371 if (heap->isolate()->log_object_relocation()) {
4372 profiling_observer.emplace(heap);
4373 }
4374 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<v8::internal::Evacuator>> evacuators;
4375 const int wanted_num_tasks = NumberOfParallelCompactionTasks(heap);
4376 for (int i = 0; i < wanted_num_tasks; i++) {
4377 auto evacuator = std::make_unique<Evacuator>(heap);
4378 if (profiling_observer) {
4379 evacuator->AddObserver(&profiling_observer.value());
4380 }
4381 evacuators.push_back(std::move(evacuator));
4382 }
4383 auto page_evacuation_job = std::make_unique<PageEvacuationJob>(
4384 heap->isolate(), collector, &evacuators, std::move(evacuation_items));
4385 TRACE_GC_NOTE_WITH_FLOW("PageEvacuationJob started",
4386 page_evacuation_job->trace_id(),
4387 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_OUT);
4388 V8::GetCurrentPlatform()
4389 ->CreateJob(v8::TaskPriority::kUserBlocking,
4390 std::move(page_evacuation_job))
4391 ->Join();
4392 for (auto& evacuator : evacuators) {
4393 evacuator->Finalize();
4394 }
4395 return wanted_num_tasks;
4396}
4397
4398enum class MemoryReductionMode { kNone, kShouldReduceMemory };
4399
4400// NewSpacePages with more live bytes than this threshold qualify for fast
4401// evacuation.
4402intptr_t NewSpacePageEvacuationThreshold() {
4403 return v8_flags.page_promotion_threshold *
4404 MemoryChunkLayout::AllocatableMemoryInDataPage() / 100;
4405}
4406
4407bool ShouldMovePage(PageMetadata* p, intptr_t live_bytes,
4408 MemoryReductionMode memory_reduction_mode) {
4409 Heap* heap = p->heap();
4410 DCHECK(!p->Chunk()->NeverEvacuate());
4411 const bool should_move_page =
4412 v8_flags.page_promotion &&
4413 (memory_reduction_mode == MemoryReductionMode::kNone) &&
4414 (live_bytes > NewSpacePageEvacuationThreshold()) &&
4415 heap->CanExpandOldGeneration(live_bytes);
4416 if (v8_flags.trace_page_promotions) {
4417 PrintIsolate(heap->isolate(),
4418 "[Page Promotion] %p: collector=mc, should move: %d"
4419 ", live bytes = %zu, promotion threshold = %zu"
4420 ", allocated labs size = %zu\n",
4421 p, should_move_page, live_bytes,
4422 NewSpacePageEvacuationThreshold(), p->AllocatedLabSize());
4423 }
4424 return should_move_page;
4425}
4426
4427void TraceEvacuation(Isolate* isolate, size_t pages_count,
4428 size_t wanted_num_tasks, size_t live_bytes,
4429 size_t aborted_pages) {
4430 DCHECK(v8_flags.trace_evacuation);
4431 PrintIsolate(
4432 isolate,
4433 "%8.0f ms: evacuation-summary: parallel=%s pages=%zu "
4434 "wanted_tasks=%zu cores=%d live_bytes=%" V8PRIdPTR
4435 " compaction_speed=%.f aborted=%zu\n",
4436 isolate->time_millis_since_init(),
4437 v8_flags.parallel_compaction ? "yes" : "no", pages_count,
4438 wanted_num_tasks, V8::GetCurrentPlatform()->NumberOfWorkerThreads() + 1,
4439 live_bytes,
4440 isolate->heap()->tracer()->CompactionSpeedInBytesPerMillisecond(),
4441 aborted_pages);
4442}
4443
4444} // namespace
4445
4446void MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel() {
4447 std::vector<std::pair<ParallelWorkItem, MutablePageMetadata*>>
4448 evacuation_items;
4449 intptr_t live_bytes = 0;
4450
4451 // Evacuation of new space pages cannot be aborted, so it needs to run
4452 // before old space evacuation.
4453 bool force_page_promotion =
4454 heap_->IsGCWithStack() && !v8_flags.compact_with_stack;
4455 for (PageMetadata* page : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4456 intptr_t live_bytes_on_page = page->live_bytes();
4457 DCHECK_LT(0, live_bytes_on_page);
4458 live_bytes += live_bytes_on_page;
4459 MemoryReductionMode memory_reduction_mode =
4460 heap_->ShouldReduceMemory() ? MemoryReductionMode::kShouldReduceMemory
4461 : MemoryReductionMode::kNone;
4462 if (ShouldMovePage(page, live_bytes_on_page, memory_reduction_mode) ||
4463 force_page_promotion) {
4464 EvacuateNewToOldSpacePageVisitor::Move(page);
4465 page->Chunk()->SetFlagNonExecutable(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
4466 DCHECK_EQ(heap_->old_space(), page->owner());
4467 // The move added page->allocated_bytes to the old space, but we are
4468 // going to sweep the page and add page->live_byte_count.
4469 heap_->old_space()->DecreaseAllocatedBytes(page->allocated_bytes(), page);
4470 }
4471 evacuation_items.emplace_back(ParallelWorkItem{}, page);
4472 }
4473
4474 if (heap_->IsGCWithStack()) {
4475 if (!v8_flags.compact_with_stack) {
4476 for (PageMetadata* page : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4477 ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidateDueToFlags(page->area_start(), page);
4478 }
4479 } else if (!v8_flags.compact_code_space_with_stack ||
4480 heap_->isolate()->InFastCCall()) {
4481 // For fast C calls we cannot patch the return address in the native stack
4482 // frame if we would relocate InstructionStream objects.
4483 for (PageMetadata* page : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4484 if (page->owner_identity() != CODE_SPACE) continue;
4485 ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidateDueToFlags(page->area_start(), page);
4486 }
4487 }
4488 } else {
4489 // There should always be a stack when we are in a fast c call.
4490 DCHECK(!heap_->isolate()->InFastCCall());
4491 }
4492
4493 if (v8_flags.stress_compaction || v8_flags.stress_compaction_random) {
4494 // Stress aborting of evacuation by aborting ~10% of evacuation candidates
4495 // when stress testing.
4496 const double kFraction = 0.05;
4497
4498 for (PageMetadata* page : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4499 MemoryChunk* chunk = page->Chunk();
4500 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) continue;
4501
4502 if (heap_->isolate()->fuzzer_rng()->NextDouble() < kFraction) {
4503 ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidateDueToFlags(page->area_start(), page);
4504 }
4505 }
4506 }
4507
4508 for (PageMetadata* page : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4509 MemoryChunk* chunk = page->Chunk();
4510 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) continue;
4511
4512 live_bytes += page->live_bytes();
4513 evacuation_items.emplace_back(ParallelWorkItem{}, page);
4514 }
4515
4516 // Promote young generation large objects.
4517 if (auto* new_lo_space = heap_->new_lo_space()) {
4518 for (auto it = new_lo_space->begin(); it != new_lo_space->end();) {
4519 LargePageMetadata* current = *(it++);
4520 Tagged<HeapObject> object = current->GetObject();
4521 if (marking_state_->IsMarked(object)) {
4522 heap_->lo_space()->PromoteNewLargeObject(current);
4523 current->Chunk()->SetFlagNonExecutable(
4524 MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
4525 promoted_large_pages_.push_back(current);
4526 evacuation_items.emplace_back(ParallelWorkItem{}, current);
4527 }
4528 }
4529 new_lo_space->set_objects_size(0);
4530 }
4531
4532 const size_t pages_count = evacuation_items.size();
4533 size_t wanted_num_tasks = 0;
4534 if (!evacuation_items.empty()) {
4535 TRACE_EVENT1(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),
4536 "MarkCompactCollector::EvacuatePagesInParallel", "pages",
4537 evacuation_items.size());
4538
4539 wanted_num_tasks = CreateAndExecuteEvacuationTasks(
4540 heap_, this, std::move(evacuation_items));
4541 }
4542
4543 const size_t aborted_pages = PostProcessAbortedEvacuationCandidates();
4544
4545 if (v8_flags.trace_evacuation) {
4546 TraceEvacuation(heap_->isolate(), pages_count, wanted_num_tasks, live_bytes,
4547 aborted_pages);
4548 }
4549}
4550
4551class EvacuationWeakObjectRetainer : public WeakObjectRetainer {
4552 public:
4553 Tagged<Object> RetainAs(Tagged<Object> object) override {
4554 if (object.IsHeapObject()) {
4555 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object = Tagged<HeapObject>::cast(object);
4556 MapWord map_word = heap_object->map_word(kRelaxedLoad);
4557 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
4558 return map_word.ToForwardingAddress(heap_object);
4559 }
4560 }
4561 return object;
4562 }
4563};
4564
4565void MarkCompactCollector::Evacuate() {
4566 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE);
4567 base::MutexGuard guard(heap_->relocation_mutex());
4568
4569 {
4570 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_PROLOGUE);
4571 EvacuatePrologue();
4572 }
4573
4574 {
4575 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_COPY);
4576 EvacuatePagesInParallel();
4577 }
4578
4579 UpdatePointersAfterEvacuation();
4580
4581 {
4582 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_CLEAN_UP);
4583
4584 for (PageMetadata* p : new_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4585 MemoryChunk* chunk = p->Chunk();
4586 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION)) {
4587 chunk->ClearFlagNonExecutable(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
4588 DCHECK_EQ(OLD_SPACE, p->owner_identity());
4589 sweeper_->AddPage(OLD_SPACE, p);
4590 } else if (v8_flags.minor_ms) {
4591 // Sweep non-promoted pages to add them back to the free list.
4592 DCHECK_EQ(NEW_SPACE, p->owner_identity());
4593 DCHECK_EQ(0, p->live_bytes());
4594 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone());
4595 PagedNewSpace* space = heap_->paged_new_space();
4596 if (space->ShouldReleaseEmptyPage()) {
4597 space->ReleasePage(p);
4598 } else {
4599 sweeper_->SweepEmptyNewSpacePage(p);
4600 }
4601 }
4602 }
4603 new_space_evacuation_pages_.clear();
4604
4605 for (LargePageMetadata* p : promoted_large_pages_) {
4606 MemoryChunk* chunk = p->Chunk();
4607 DCHECK(chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION));
4608 chunk->ClearFlagNonExecutable(MemoryChunk::PAGE_NEW_OLD_PROMOTION);
4609 Tagged<HeapObject> object = p->GetObject();
4610 MarkBit::From(object).Clear();
4611 p->ProgressBar().ResetIfEnabled();
4612 p->SetLiveBytes(0);
4613 }
4614 promoted_large_pages_.clear();
4615
4616 for (PageMetadata* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
4617 MemoryChunk* chunk = p->Chunk();
4618 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) {
4619 sweeper_->AddPage(p->owner_identity(), p);
4620 chunk->ClearFlagSlow(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED);
4621 }
4622 }
4623 }
4624
4625 {
4626 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_EPILOGUE);
4627 EvacuateEpilogue();
4628 }
4629
4630#ifdef VERIFY_HEAP
4631 if (v8_flags.verify_heap && !sweeper_->sweeping_in_progress()) {
4632 EvacuationVerifier verifier(heap_);
4633 verifier.Run();
4634 }
4635#endif // VERIFY_HEAP
4636}
4637
4638class UpdatingItem : public ParallelWorkItem {
4639 public:
4640 virtual ~UpdatingItem() = default;
4641 virtual void Process() = 0;
4642};
4643
4644class PointersUpdatingJob : public v8::JobTask {
4645 public:
4646 explicit PointersUpdatingJob(
4647 Isolate* isolate, MarkCompactCollector* collector,
4648 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<UpdatingItem>> updating_items)
4649 : collector_(collector),
4650 updating_items_(std::move(updating_items)),
4651 remaining_updating_items_(updating_items_.size()),
4652 generator_(updating_items_.size()),
4653 tracer_(isolate->heap()->tracer()),
4654 trace_id_(reinterpret_cast<uint64_t>(this) ^
4655 tracer_->CurrentEpoch(GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE)) {}
4656
4657 void Run(JobDelegate* delegate) override {
4658 // In case multi-cage pointer compression mode is enabled ensure that
4659 // current thread's cage base values are properly initialized.
4660 PtrComprCageAccessScope ptr_compr_cage_access_scope(
4661 collector_->heap()->isolate());
4662
4663 if (delegate->IsJoiningThread()) {
4664 TRACE_GC_WITH_FLOW(tracer_,
4665 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_PARALLEL,
4666 trace_id_, TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN);
4667 UpdatePointers(delegate);
4668 } else {
4669 TRACE_GC_EPOCH_WITH_FLOW(
4670 tracer_, GCTracer::Scope::MC_BACKGROUND_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS,
4671 ThreadKind::kBackground, trace_id_, TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_IN);
4672 UpdatePointers(delegate);
4673 }
4674 }
4675
4676 void UpdatePointers(JobDelegate* delegate) {
4677 while (remaining_updating_items_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) > 0) {
4678 base::Optional<size_t> index = generator_.GetNext();
4679 if (!index) return;
4680 for (size_t i = *index; i < updating_items_.size(); ++i) {
4681 auto& work_item = updating_items_[i];
4682 if (!work_item->TryAcquire()) break;
4683 work_item->Process();
4684 if (remaining_updating_items_.fetch_sub(1, std::memory_order_relaxed) <=
4685 1) {
4686 return;
4687 }
4688 }
4689 }
4690 }
4691
4692 size_t GetMaxConcurrency(size_t worker_count) const override {
4693 size_t items = remaining_updating_items_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed);
4694 if (!v8_flags.parallel_pointer_update ||
4695 !collector_->UseBackgroundThreadsInCycle()) {
4696 return std::min<size_t>(items, 1);
4697 }
4698 const size_t kMaxPointerUpdateTasks = 8;
4699 size_t max_concurrency = std::min<size_t>(kMaxPointerUpdateTasks, items);
4700 DCHECK_IMPLIES(items > 0, max_concurrency > 0);
4701 return max_concurrency;
4702 }
4703
4704 uint64_t trace_id() const { return trace_id_; }
4705
4706 private:
4707 MarkCompactCollector* collector_;
4708 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<UpdatingItem>> updating_items_;
4709 std::atomic<size_t> remaining_updating_items_{0};
4710 IndexGenerator generator_;
4711
4712 GCTracer* tracer_;
4713 const uint64_t trace_id_;
4714};
4715
4716namespace {
4717
4718class RememberedSetUpdatingItem : public UpdatingItem {
4719 public:
4720 explicit RememberedSetUpdatingItem(Heap* heap, MutablePageMetadata* chunk)
4721 : heap_(heap),
4722 marking_state_(heap_->non_atomic_marking_state()),
4723 chunk_(chunk),
4724 record_old_to_shared_slots_(heap->isolate()->has_shared_space() &&
4725 !chunk->Chunk()->InWritableSharedSpace()) {}
4726 ~RememberedSetUpdatingItem() override = default;
4727
4728 void Process() override {
4729 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),
4730 "RememberedSetUpdatingItem::Process");
4731 UpdateUntypedPointers();
4732 UpdateTypedPointers();
4733 }
4734
4735 private:
4736 template <typename TSlot>
4737 inline void CheckSlotForOldToSharedUntyped(PtrComprCageBase cage_base,
4738 MutablePageMetadata* page,
4739 TSlot slot) {
4740 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object;
4741
4742 if (!slot.load(cage_base).GetHeapObject(&heap_object)) {
4743 return;
4744 }
4745
4746 if (InWritableSharedSpace(heap_object)) {
4747 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::Insert<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(
4748 page, page->Offset(slot.address()));
4749 }
4750 }
4751
4752 inline void CheckSlotForOldToSharedTyped(
4753 MutablePageMetadata* page, SlotType slot_type, Address addr,
4754 WritableJitAllocation& jit_allocation) {
4755 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object =
4756 UpdateTypedSlotHelper::GetTargetObject(page->heap(), slot_type, addr);
4757
4758#if DEBUG
4759 UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
4760 jit_allocation, page->heap(), slot_type, addr,
4761 [heap_object](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4762 DCHECK_EQ((*slot).GetHeapObjectAssumeStrong(), heap_object);
4763 return KEEP_SLOT;
4764 });
4765#endif // DEBUG
4766
4767 if (InWritableSharedSpace(heap_object)) {
4768 const uintptr_t offset = page->Offset(addr);
4769 DCHECK_LT(offset, static_cast<uintptr_t>(TypedSlotSet::kMaxOffset));
4770 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::InsertTyped(page, slot_type,
4771 static_cast<uint32_t>(offset));
4772 }
4773 }
4774
4775 template <typename TSlot>
4776 inline void CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(TSlot slot,
4777 const PtrComprCageBase cage_base) {
4778 static_assert(
4779 std::is_same<TSlot, FullMaybeObjectSlot>::value ||
4780 std::is_same<TSlot, MaybeObjectSlot>::value,
4781 "Only FullMaybeObjectSlot and MaybeObjectSlot are expected here");
4782 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_object;
4783 if (!(*slot).GetHeapObject(&heap_object)) return;
4784 if (!Heap::InYoungGeneration(heap_object)) return;
4785
4786 if (!v8_flags.sticky_mark_bits) {
4787 DCHECK_IMPLIES(v8_flags.minor_ms && !Heap::IsLargeObject(heap_object),
4788 Heap::InToPage(heap_object));
4789 DCHECK_IMPLIES(!v8_flags.minor_ms || Heap::IsLargeObject(heap_object),
4790 Heap::InFromPage(heap_object));
4791 }
4792
4793 // OLD_TO_NEW slots are recorded in dead memory, so they might point to
4794 // dead objects.
4795 DCHECK_IMPLIES(!heap_object->map_word(kRelaxedLoad).IsForwardingAddress(),
4796 !marking_state_->IsMarked(heap_object));
4797 UpdateSlot(cage_base, slot);
4798 }
4799
4800 void UpdateUntypedPointers() {
4801 UpdateUntypedOldToNewPointers<OLD_TO_NEW>();
4802 UpdateUntypedOldToNewPointers<OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND>();
4803 UpdateUntypedOldToOldPointers();
4804 UpdateUntypedOldToCodePointers();
4805 UpdateUntypedTrustedToTrustedPointers();
4806 }
4807
4808 template <RememberedSetType old_to_new_type>
4809 void UpdateUntypedOldToNewPointers() {
4810 if (!chunk_->slot_set<old_to_new_type, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) return;
4811
4812 const PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
4813 // Marking bits are cleared already when the page is already swept. This
4814 // is fine since in that case the sweeper has already removed dead invalid
4815 // objects as well.
4816 RememberedSet<old_to_new_type>::Iterate(
4817 chunk_,
4818 [this, cage_base](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4819 CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(slot, cage_base);
4820 // A new space string might have been promoted into the shared heap
4821 // during GC.
4822 if (record_old_to_shared_slots_) {
4823 CheckSlotForOldToSharedUntyped(cage_base, chunk_, slot);
4824 }
4825 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4826 // iteration.
4827 return KEEP_SLOT;
4828 },
4829 SlotSet::KEEP_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4830
4831 // Full GCs will empty new space, so [old_to_new_type] is empty.
4832 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet(old_to_new_type);
4833 }
4834
4835 void UpdateUntypedOldToOldPointers() {
4836 if (!chunk_->slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) return;
4837
4838 const PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
4839 if (chunk_->Chunk()->executable()) {
4840 // When updating pointer in an InstructionStream (in particular, the
4841 // pointer to relocation info), we need to use WriteProtectedSlots that
4842 // ensure that the code page is unlocked.
4843 WritableJitPage jit_page(chunk_->area_start(), chunk_->area_size());
4844 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::Iterate(
4845 chunk_,
4846 [&](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4847 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation =
4848 jit_page.LookupAllocationContaining(slot.address());
4849 UpdateSlot(cage_base, WriteProtectedSlot<ObjectSlot>(
4850 jit_allocation, slot.address()));
4851 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4852 // iteration.
4853 return KEEP_SLOT;
4854 },
4855 SlotSet::KEEP_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4856 } else {
4857 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::Iterate(
4858 chunk_,
4859 [&](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4860 UpdateSlot(cage_base, slot);
4861 // A string might have been promoted into the shared heap during
4862 // GC.
4863 if (record_old_to_shared_slots_) {
4864 CheckSlotForOldToSharedUntyped(cage_base, chunk_, slot);
4865 }
4866 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4867 // iteration.
4868 return KEEP_SLOT;
4869 },
4870 SlotSet::KEEP_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4871 }
4872
4873 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet(OLD_TO_OLD);
4874 }
4875
4876 void UpdateUntypedOldToCodePointers() {
4877 if (!chunk_->slot_set<OLD_TO_CODE, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) return;
4878
4879 const PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
4880#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
4881 const PtrComprCageBase code_cage_base(heap_->isolate()->code_cage_base());
4882#else
4883 const PtrComprCageBase code_cage_base = cage_base;
4884#endif
4885 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_CODE>::Iterate(
4886 chunk_,
4887 [=](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4888 Tagged<HeapObject> host = HeapObject::FromAddress(
4889 slot.address() - Code::kInstructionStreamOffset);
4890 DCHECK(IsCode(host, cage_base));
4891 UpdateStrongCodeSlot(host, cage_base, code_cage_base,
4892 InstructionStreamSlot(slot.address()));
4893 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4894 // iteration.
4895 return KEEP_SLOT;
4896 },
4897 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4898
4899 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet(OLD_TO_CODE);
4900 }
4901
4902 void UpdateUntypedTrustedToTrustedPointers() {
4903#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
4904 // When the sandbox is enabled, we must not process the TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED
4905 // remembered set on any chunk that is located inside the sandbox (in which
4906 // case the set should be unused). This is because an attacker could either
4907 // directly modify the TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED set on such a chunk, or trick the
4908 // GC into populating it with invalid pointers, both of which may lead to
4909 // memory corruption inside the trusted space here.
4910 if (InsideSandbox(chunk_->ChunkAddress())) return;
4911#endif
4912 if (!chunk_->slot_set<TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>()) return;
4913
4914 // TODO(saelo) we can probably drop all the cage_bases here once we no
4915 // longer need to pass them into our slot implementations.
4916 const PtrComprCageBase unused_cage_base(kNullAddress);
4917
4918 if (chunk_->Chunk()->executable()) {
4919 // When updating the InstructionStream -> Code pointer, we need to use
4920 // WriteProtectedSlots that ensure that the code page is unlocked.
4921 WritableJitPage jit_page(chunk_->area_start(), chunk_->area_size());
4922
4923 RememberedSet<TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED>::Iterate(
4924 chunk_,
4925 [&](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4926 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation =
4927 jit_page.LookupAllocationContaining(slot.address());
4928 UpdateStrongSlot(unused_cage_base,
4929 WriteProtectedSlot<ProtectedPointerSlot>(
4930 jit_allocation, slot.address()));
4931 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4932 // iteration.
4933 return KEEP_SLOT;
4934 },
4935 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4936 } else {
4937 RememberedSet<TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED>::Iterate(
4938 chunk_,
4939 [&](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4940 UpdateStrongSlot(unused_cage_base,
4941 ProtectedPointerSlot(slot.address()));
4942 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4943 // iteration.
4944 return KEEP_SLOT;
4945 },
4946 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
4947 }
4948
4949 chunk_->ReleaseSlotSet(TRUSTED_TO_TRUSTED);
4950 }
4951
4952 void UpdateTypedPointers() {
4953 if (!chunk_->Chunk()->executable()) {
4954 DCHECK_NULL((chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW>()));
4955 DCHECK_NULL((chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD>()));
4956 return;
4957 }
4958
4959 WritableJitPage jit_page = ThreadIsolation::LookupWritableJitPage(
4960 chunk_->area_start(), chunk_->area_size());
4961 UpdateTypedOldToNewPointers(jit_page);
4962 UpdateTypedOldToOldPointers(jit_page);
4963 }
4964
4965 void UpdateTypedOldToNewPointers(WritableJitPage& jit_page) {
4966 if (chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() == nullptr)
4967 return;
4968 const PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
4969 const auto check_and_update_old_to_new_slot_fn =
4970 [this, cage_base](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
4971 CheckAndUpdateOldToNewSlot(slot, cage_base);
4972 return KEEP_SLOT;
4973 };
4974
4975 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::IterateTyped(
4976 chunk_, [this, &check_and_update_old_to_new_slot_fn, &jit_page](
4977 SlotType slot_type, Address slot) {
4978 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation =
4979 jit_page.LookupAllocationContaining(slot);
4980 UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
4981 jit_allocation, heap_, slot_type, slot,
4982 check_and_update_old_to_new_slot_fn);
4983 // A new space string might have been promoted into the shared heap
4984 // during GC.
4985 if (record_old_to_shared_slots_) {
4986 CheckSlotForOldToSharedTyped(chunk_, slot_type, slot,
4987 jit_allocation);
4988 }
4989 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
4990 // iteration.
4991 return KEEP_SLOT;
4992 });
4993 // Full GCs will empty new space, so OLD_TO_NEW is empty.
4994 chunk_->ReleaseTypedSlotSet(OLD_TO_NEW);
4995 // OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND typed slots set should always be empty.
4996 DCHECK_NULL(chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND>());
4997 }
4998
4999 void UpdateTypedOldToOldPointers(WritableJitPage& jit_page) {
5000 if (chunk_->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_OLD, AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>() == nullptr)
5001 return;
5002 PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
5003 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_OLD>::IterateTyped(
5004 chunk_, [this, cage_base, &jit_page](SlotType slot_type, Address slot) {
5005 // Using UpdateStrongSlot is OK here, because there are no weak
5006 // typed slots.
5007 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation =
5008 jit_page.LookupAllocationContaining(slot);
5009 SlotCallbackResult result = UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
5010 jit_allocation, heap_, slot_type, slot,
5011 [cage_base](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
5012 UpdateStrongSlot(cage_base, slot);
5013 // Always keep slot since all slots are dropped at once after
5014 // iteration.
5015 return KEEP_SLOT;
5016 });
5017 // A string might have been promoted into the shared heap during GC.
5018 if (record_old_to_shared_slots_) {
5019 CheckSlotForOldToSharedTyped(chunk_, slot_type, slot,
5020 jit_allocation);
5021 }
5022 return result;
5023 });
5024 chunk_->ReleaseTypedSlotSet(OLD_TO_OLD);
5025 }
5026
5027 Heap* heap_;
5028 NonAtomicMarkingState* marking_state_;
5029 MutablePageMetadata* chunk_;
5030 const bool record_old_to_shared_slots_;
5031};
5032
5033} // namespace
5034
5035namespace {
5036template <typename IterateableSpace>
5037void CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(
5038 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<UpdatingItem>>* items,
5039 IterateableSpace* space) {
5040 for (MutablePageMetadata* page : *space) {
5041 // No need to update pointers on evacuation candidates. Evacuated pages will
5042 // be released after this phase.
5043 if (page->Chunk()->IsEvacuationCandidate()) continue;
5044 if (page->ContainsAnySlots()) {
5045 items->emplace_back(
5046 std::make_unique<RememberedSetUpdatingItem>(space->heap(), page));
5047 }
5048 }
5049}
5050} // namespace
5051
5052class EphemeronTableUpdatingItem : public UpdatingItem {
5053 public:
5054 enum EvacuationState { kRegular, kAborted };
5055
5056 explicit EphemeronTableUpdatingItem(Heap* heap) : heap_(heap) {}
5057 ~EphemeronTableUpdatingItem() override = default;
5058
5059 void Process() override {
5060 TRACE_EVENT0(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.gc"),
5061 "EphemeronTableUpdatingItem::Process");
5062 PtrComprCageBase cage_base(heap_->isolate());
5063
5064 auto* table_map = heap_->ephemeron_remembered_set()->tables();
5065 for (auto it = table_map->begin(); it != table_map->end(); it++) {
5066 Tagged<EphemeronHashTable> table = it->first;
5067 auto& indices = it->second;
5068 if (table->map_word(cage_base, kRelaxedLoad).IsForwardingAddress()) {
5069 // The object has moved, so ignore slots in dead memory here.
5070 continue;
5071 }
5072 DCHECK(IsMap(table->map(cage_base), cage_base));
5073 DCHECK(IsEphemeronHashTable(table, cage_base));
5074 for (auto iti = indices.begin(); iti != indices.end(); ++iti) {
5075 // EphemeronHashTable keys must be heap objects.
5076 ObjectSlot key_slot(table->RawFieldOfElementAt(
5077 EphemeronHashTable::EntryToIndex(InternalIndex(*iti))));
5078 Tagged<Object> key_object = key_slot.Relaxed_Load();
5079 Tagged<HeapObject> key;
5080 CHECK(key_object.GetHeapObject(&key));
5081 MapWord map_word = key->map_word(cage_base, kRelaxedLoad);
5082 if (map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) {
5083 key = map_word.ToForwardingAddress(key);
5084 key_slot.Relaxed_Store(key);
5085 }
5086 }
5087 }
5088 table_map->clear();
5089 }
5090
5091 private:
5092 Heap* const heap_;
5093};
5094
5095void MarkCompactCollector::UpdatePointersAfterEvacuation() {
5096 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS);
5097
5098 {
5099 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(),
5100 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_TO_NEW_ROOTS);
5101 // The external string table is updated at the end.
5102 PointersUpdatingVisitor updating_visitor(heap_);
5103 heap_->IterateRootsIncludingClients(
5104 &updating_visitor,
5105 base::EnumSet<SkipRoot>{SkipRoot::kExternalStringTable,
5106 SkipRoot::kConservativeStack,
5107 SkipRoot::kReadOnlyBuiltins});
5108 }
5109
5110 {
5111 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(),
5112 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_CLIENT_HEAPS);
5113 UpdatePointersInClientHeaps();
5114 }
5115
5116 {
5117 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(),
5118 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_SLOTS_MAIN);
5119 std::vector<std::unique_ptr<UpdatingItem>> updating_items;
5120
5121 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->old_space());
5122 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->code_space());
5123 if (heap_->shared_space()) {
5124 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->shared_space());
5125 }
5126 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->lo_space());
5127 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->code_lo_space());
5128 if (heap_->shared_lo_space()) {
5129 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items,
5130 heap_->shared_lo_space());
5131 }
5132 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items, heap_->trusted_space());
5133 CollectRememberedSetUpdatingItems(&updating_items,
5134 heap_->trusted_lo_space());
5135
5136 // Iterating to space may require a valid body descriptor for e.g.
5137 // WasmStruct which races with updating a slot in Map. Since to space is
5138 // empty after a full GC, such races can't happen.
5139 DCHECK_IMPLIES(heap_->new_space(), heap_->new_space()->Size() == 0);
5140
5141 updating_items.push_back(
5142 std::make_unique<EphemeronTableUpdatingItem>(heap_));
5143
5144 auto pointers_updating_job = std::make_unique<PointersUpdatingJob>(
5145 heap_->isolate(), this, std::move(updating_items));
5146 TRACE_GC_NOTE_WITH_FLOW("PointersUpdatingJob started",
5147 pointers_updating_job->trace_id(),
5148 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_OUT);
5149 V8::GetCurrentPlatform()
5150 ->CreateJob(v8::TaskPriority::kUserBlocking,
5151 std::move(pointers_updating_job))
5152 ->Join();
5153 }
5154
5155 {
5156 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(),
5157 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_WEAK);
5158 // Update pointers from external string table.
5159 heap_->UpdateReferencesInExternalStringTable(
5160 &UpdateReferenceInExternalStringTableEntry);
5161
5162 // Update pointers in string forwarding table.
5163 // When GC was performed without a stack, the table was cleared and this
5164 // does nothing. In the case this was a GC with stack, we need to update
5165 // the entries for evacuated objects.
5166 // All entries are objects in shared space (unless
5167 // --always-use-forwarding-table), so we only need to update pointers during
5168 // a shared GC.
5169 if (heap_->isolate()->OwnsStringTables() ||
5170 V8_UNLIKELY(v8_flags.always_use_string_forwarding_table)) {
5171 heap_->isolate()->string_forwarding_table()->UpdateAfterFullEvacuation();
5172 }
5173
5174 EvacuationWeakObjectRetainer evacuation_object_retainer;
5175 heap_->ProcessWeakListRoots(&evacuation_object_retainer);
5176 }
5177
5178 {
5179 TRACE_GC(heap_->tracer(),
5180 GCTracer::Scope::MC_EVACUATE_UPDATE_POINTERS_POINTER_TABLES);
5181 UpdatePointersInPointerTables();
5182 }
5183
5184 // Flush the inner_pointer_to_code_cache which may now have stale contents.
5185 heap_->isolate()->inner_pointer_to_code_cache()->Flush();
5186}
5187
5188void MarkCompactCollector::UpdatePointersInClientHeaps() {
5189 Isolate* const isolate = heap_->isolate();
5190 if (!isolate->is_shared_space_isolate()) return;
5191
5192 isolate->global_safepoint()->IterateClientIsolates(
5193 [this](Isolate* client) { UpdatePointersInClientHeap(client); });
5194}
5195
5196void MarkCompactCollector::UpdatePointersInClientHeap(Isolate* client) {
5197 PtrComprCageBase cage_base(client);
5198 MemoryChunkIterator chunk_iterator(client->heap());
5199
5200 while (chunk_iterator.HasNext()) {
5201 MutablePageMetadata* page = chunk_iterator.Next();
5202 MemoryChunk* chunk = page->Chunk();
5203
5204 const auto slot_count = RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::Iterate(
5205 page,
5206 [cage_base](MaybeObjectSlot slot) {
5207 return UpdateOldToSharedSlot(cage_base, slot);
5208 },
5209 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
5210
5211 if (slot_count == 0 || chunk->InYoungGeneration())
5212 page->ReleaseSlotSet(OLD_TO_SHARED);
5213
5214 if (!chunk->executable()) {
5215 DCHECK_NULL(page->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_SHARED>());
5216 continue;
5217 }
5218
5219 WritableJitPage jit_page = ThreadIsolation::LookupWritableJitPage(
5220 page->area_start(), page->area_size());
5221 const auto typed_slot_count = RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::IterateTyped(
5222 page, [this, &jit_page](SlotType slot_type, Address slot) {
5223 // Using UpdateStrongSlot is OK here, because there are no weak
5224 // typed slots.
5225 PtrComprCageBase cage_base = heap_->isolate();
5226 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation =
5227 jit_page.LookupAllocationContaining(slot);
5228 return UpdateTypedSlotHelper::UpdateTypedSlot(
5229 jit_allocation, heap_, slot_type, slot,
5230 [cage_base](FullMaybeObjectSlot slot) {
5231 return UpdateStrongOldToSharedSlot(cage_base, slot);
5232 });
5233 });
5234 if (typed_slot_count == 0 || chunk->InYoungGeneration())
5235 page->ReleaseTypedSlotSet(OLD_TO_SHARED);
5236 }
5237}
5238
5239void MarkCompactCollector::UpdatePointersInPointerTables() {
5240#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
5241 // Process an entry of a pointer table, returning either the relocated object
5242 // or a null pointer if the object wasn't relocated.
5243 auto process_entry = [&](Address content) -> Tagged<ExposedTrustedObject> {
5244 Tagged<HeapObject> heap_obj = HeapObject::cast(Tagged<Object>(content));
5245 MapWord map_word = heap_obj->map_word(kRelaxedLoad);
5246 if (!map_word.IsForwardingAddress()) return {};
5247 Tagged<HeapObject> relocated_object =
5248 map_word.ToForwardingAddress(heap_obj);
5249 DCHECK(IsExposedTrustedObject(relocated_object));
5250 return ExposedTrustedObject::cast(relocated_object);
5251 };
5252
5253 TrustedPointerTable* const tpt = &heap_->isolate()->trusted_pointer_table();
5254 tpt->IterateActiveEntriesIn(
5255 heap_->trusted_pointer_space(),
5256 [&](TrustedPointerHandle handle, Address content) {
5257 Tagged<ExposedTrustedObject> relocated_object = process_entry(content);
5258 if (!relocated_object.is_null()) {
5259 DCHECK_EQ(handle, relocated_object->self_indirect_pointer_handle());
5260 auto instance_type = relocated_object->map()->instance_type();
5261 auto tag = IndirectPointerTagFromInstanceType(instance_type);
5262 tpt->Set(handle, relocated_object.ptr(), tag);
5263 }
5264 });
5265
5266 CodePointerTable* const cpt = GetProcessWideCodePointerTable();
5267 cpt->IterateActiveEntriesIn(
5268 heap_->code_pointer_space(),
5269 [&](CodePointerHandle handle, Address content) {
5270 Tagged<ExposedTrustedObject> relocated_object = process_entry(content);
5271 if (!relocated_object.is_null()) {
5272 DCHECK_EQ(handle, relocated_object->self_indirect_pointer_handle());
5273 cpt->SetCodeObject(handle, relocated_object.address());
5274 }
5275 });
5276#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
5277}
5278
5279void MarkCompactCollector::ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidateDueToOOM(
5280 Address failed_start, PageMetadata* page) {
5281 base::MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
5282 aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_oom_.push_back(
5283 std::make_pair(failed_start, page));
5284}
5285
5286void MarkCompactCollector::ReportAbortedEvacuationCandidateDueToFlags(
5287 Address failed_start, PageMetadata* page) {
5288 MemoryChunk* chunk = page->Chunk();
5289 DCHECK(!chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED));
5290 chunk->SetFlagSlow(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED);
5291 base::MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
5292 aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_flags_.push_back(
5293 std::make_pair(failed_start, page));
5294}
5295
5296namespace {
5297
5298void ReRecordPage(Heap* heap, Address failed_start, PageMetadata* page) {
5299 DCHECK(page->Chunk()->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED));
5300
5301 // Aborted compaction page. We have to record slots here, since we
5302 // might not have recorded them in first place.
5303
5304 // Remove mark bits in evacuated area.
5305 page->marking_bitmap()->ClearRange<AccessMode::NON_ATOMIC>(
5306 MarkingBitmap::AddressToIndex(page->area_start()),
5307 MarkingBitmap::LimitAddressToIndex(failed_start));
5308
5309 // Remove outdated slots.
5310 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRange(page, page->area_start(), failed_start,
5311 SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
5312 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW>::RemoveRangeTyped(page, page->area_start(),
5313 failed_start);
5314
5315 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND>::RemoveRange(
5316 page, page->area_start(), failed_start, SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
5317 DCHECK_NULL(page->typed_slot_set<OLD_TO_NEW_BACKGROUND>());
5318
5319 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::RemoveRange(
5320 page, page->area_start(), failed_start, SlotSet::FREE_EMPTY_BUCKETS);
5321 RememberedSet<OLD_TO_SHARED>::RemoveRangeTyped(page, page->area_start(),
5322 failed_start);
5323
5324 // Re-record slots and recompute live bytes.
5325 EvacuateRecordOnlyVisitor visitor(heap);
5326 LiveObjectVisitor::VisitMarkedObjectsNoFail(page, &visitor);
5327 page->SetLiveBytes(visitor.live_object_size());
5328 // Array buffers will be processed during pointer updating.
5329}
5330
5331} // namespace
5332
5333size_t MarkCompactCollector::PostProcessAbortedEvacuationCandidates() {
5334 for (auto start_and_page : aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_oom_) {
5335 PageMetadata* page = start_and_page.second;
5336 MemoryChunk* chunk = page->Chunk();
5337 DCHECK(!chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED));
5338 chunk->SetFlagSlow(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED);
5339 }
5340 for (auto start_and_page : aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_oom_) {
5341 ReRecordPage(heap_, start_and_page.first, start_and_page.second);
5342 }
5343 for (auto start_and_page : aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_flags_) {
5344 ReRecordPage(heap_, start_and_page.first, start_and_page.second);
5345 }
5346 const size_t aborted_pages =
5347 aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_oom_.size() +
5348 aborted_evacuation_candidates_due_to_flags_.size();
5349 size_t aborted_pages_verified = 0;
5350 for (PageMetadata* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
5351 MemoryChunk* chunk = p->Chunk();
5352 if (chunk->IsFlagSet(MemoryChunk::COMPACTION_WAS_ABORTED)) {
5353 // Only clear EVACUATION_CANDIDATE flag after all slots were re-recorded
5354 // on all aborted pages. Necessary since repopulating
5355 // OLD_TO_OLD still requires the EVACUATION_CANDIDATE flag. After clearing
5356 // the evacuation candidate flag the page is again in a regular state.
5357 p->ClearEvacuationCandidate();
5358 aborted_pages_verified++;
5359 } else {
5360 DCHECK(chunk->IsEvacuationCandidate());
5361 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone());
5362 }
5363 }
5364 DCHECK_EQ(aborted_pages_verified, aborted_pages);
5365 USE(aborted_pages_verified);
5366 return aborted_pages;
5367}
5368
5369void MarkCompactCollector::ReleaseEvacuationCandidates() {
5370 for (PageMetadata* p : old_space_evacuation_pages_) {
5371 if (!p->Chunk()->IsEvacuationCandidate()) continue;
5372 PagedSpace* space = static_cast<PagedSpace*>(p->owner());
5373 p->SetLiveBytes(0);
5374 CHECK(p->SweepingDone());
5375 space->ReleasePage(p);
5376 }
5377 old_space_evacuation_pages_.clear();
5378 compacting_ = false;
5379}
5380
5381void MarkCompactCollector::StartSweepNewSpace() {
5382 PagedSpaceForNewSpace* paged_space = heap_->paged_new_space()->paged_space();
5383 paged_space->ClearAllocatorState();
5384
5385 int will_be_swept = 0;
5386
5387 DCHECK_EQ(Heap::ResizeNewSpaceMode::kNone, resize_new_space_);
5388 resize_new_space_ = heap_->ShouldResizeNewSpace();
5389 if (resize_new_space_ == Heap::ResizeNewSpaceMode::kShrink) {
5390 paged_space->StartShrinking();
5391 }
5392
5393 DCHECK(empty_new_space_pages_to_be_swept_.empty());
5394 for (auto it = paged_space->begin(); it != paged_space->end();) {
5395 PageMetadata* p = *(it++);
5396 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone());
5397
5398 if (p->live_bytes() > 0) {
5399 // Non-empty pages will be evacuated/promoted.
5400 continue;
5401 }
5402
5403 if (paged_space->ShouldReleaseEmptyPage()) {
5404 paged_space->ReleasePage(p);
5405 } else {
5406 empty_new_space_pages_to_be_swept_.push_back(p);
5407 }
5408 will_be_swept++;
5409 }
5410
5411 if (v8_flags.gc_verbose) {
5412 PrintIsolate(heap_->isolate(),
5413 "sweeping: space=%s initialized_for_sweeping=%d",
5414 ToString(paged_space->identity()), will_be_swept);
5415 }
5416}
5417
5418void MarkCompactCollector::StartSweepSpace(PagedSpace* space) {
5419 DCHECK_NE(NEW_SPACE, space->identity());
5420 space->ClearAllocatorState();
5421
5422 int will_be_swept = 0;
5423 bool unused_page_present = false;
5424
5425 Sweeper* sweeper = heap_->sweeper();
5426
5427 // Loop needs to support deletion if live bytes == 0 for a page.
5428 for (auto it = space->begin(); it != space->end();) {
5429 PageMetadata* p = *(it++);
5430 DCHECK(p->SweepingDone());
5431
5432 if (p->Chunk()->IsEvacuationCandidate()) {
5433 DCHECK_NE(NEW_SPACE, space->identity());
5434 // Will be processed in Evacuate.
5435 continue;
5436 }
5437
5438 // One unused page is kept, all further are released before sweeping them.
5439 if (p->live_bytes() == 0) {
5440 if (unused_page_present) {
5441 if (v8_flags.gc_verbose) {
5442 PrintIsolate(heap_->isolate(), "sweeping: released page: %p",
5443 static_cast<void*>(p));
5444 }
5445 space->ReleasePage(p);
5446 continue;
5447 }
5448 unused_page_present = true;
5449 }
5450
5451 sweeper->AddPage(space->identity(), p);
5452 will_be_swept++;
5453 }
5454
5455 if (v8_flags.sticky_mark_bits && space->identity() == OLD_SPACE) {
5456 static_cast<StickySpace*>(space)->set_old_objects_size(space->Size());
5457 }
5458
5459 if (v8_flags.gc_verbose) {
5460 PrintIsolate(heap_->isolate(),
5461 "sweeping: space=%s initialized_for_sweeping=%d",
5462 ToString(space->identity()), will_be_swept);
5463 }
5464}
5465
5466namespace {
5467bool ShouldPostponeFreeingEmptyPages(LargeObjectSpace* space) {
5468 // Delay releasing dead old large object pages until after pointer updating is
5469 // done because dead old space objects may have old-to-new slots (which
5470 // were possibly later overriden with old-to-old references) that are
5471 // pointing to these pages and will need to be updated.
5472 if (space->identity() == LO_SPACE) return true;
5473 // Old-to-new slots may also point to shared spaces. Delay releasing so that
5474 // updating slots in dead old objects can access the dead shared objects.
5475 if (space->identity() == SHARED_LO_SPACE) return true;
5476 return false;
5477}
5478} // namespace
5479
5480void MarkCompactCollector::SweepLargeSpace(LargeObjectSpace* space) {
5481 PtrComprCageBase cage_base(heap_->isolate());
5482 size_t surviving_object_size = 0;
5483 const MemoryAllocator::FreeMode free_mode =
5484 ShouldPostponeFreeingEmptyPages(space)
5485 ? MemoryAllocator::FreeMode::kPostpone
5486 : MemoryAllocator::FreeMode::kImmediately;
5487 for (auto it = space->begin(); it != space->end();) {
5488 LargePageMetadata* current = *(it++);
5489 Tagged<HeapObject> object = current->GetObject();
5490 if (!marking_state_->IsMarked(object)) {
5491 // Object is dead and page can be released.
5492 space->RemovePage(current);
5493 heap_->memory_allocator()->Free(free_mode, current);
5494
5495 continue;
5496 }
5497 MarkBit::From(object).Clear();
5498 current->ProgressBar().ResetIfEnabled();
5499 current->SetLiveBytes(0);
5500 surviving_object_size += static_cast<size_t>(object->Size(cage_base));
5501 }
5502 space->set_objects_size(surviving_object_size);
5503}
5504
5505void MarkCompactCollector::Sweep() {
5506 DCHECK(!sweeper_->sweeping_in_progress());
5507 sweeper_->InitializeMajorSweeping();
5508
5509 TRACE_GC_EPOCH_WITH_FLOW(
5510 heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP, ThreadKind::kMain,
5511 sweeper_->GetTraceIdForFlowEvent(GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP),
5512 TRACE_EVENT_FLAG_FLOW_OUT);
5513#ifdef DEBUG
5514 state_ = SWEEP_SPACES;
5515#endif
5516
5517 {
5518 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_LO,
5519 ThreadKind::kMain);
5520 SweepLargeSpace(heap_->lo_space());
5521 }
5522 {
5523 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(
5524 heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_CODE_LO, ThreadKind::kMain);
5525 SweepLargeSpace(heap_->code_lo_space());
5526 }
5527 if (heap_->shared_space()) {
5528 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(),
5529 GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_SHARED_LO,
5530 ThreadKind::kMain);
5531 SweepLargeSpace(heap_->shared_lo_space());
5532 }
5533 {
5534 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_OLD,
5535 ThreadKind::kMain);
5536 StartSweepSpace(heap_->old_space());
5537 }
5538 {
5539 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_CODE,
5540 ThreadKind::kMain);
5541 StartSweepSpace(heap_->code_space());
5542 }
5543 if (heap_->shared_space()) {
5544 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(
5545 heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_SHARED, ThreadKind::kMain);
5546 StartSweepSpace(heap_->shared_space());
5547 }
5548 {
5549 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(
5550 heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_TRUSTED, ThreadKind::kMain);
5551 StartSweepSpace(heap_->trusted_space());
5552 }
5553 {
5554 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(),
5555 GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_TRUSTED_LO,
5556 ThreadKind::kMain);
5557 SweepLargeSpace(heap_->trusted_lo_space());
5558 }
5559 if (v8_flags.minor_ms && heap_->new_space()) {
5560 GCTracer::Scope sweep_scope(heap_->tracer(), GCTracer::Scope::MC_SWEEP_NEW,
5561 ThreadKind::kMain);
5562 StartSweepNewSpace();
5563 }
5564
5565 sweeper_->StartMajorSweeping();
5566}
